addressLine1.description: At least one address field is required -- addressLine1, addressLine2, city, state, zip and/or country

addressLine2.description: At least one address field is required -- addressLine1, addressLine2, city, state, zip and/or country

city.description: At least one address field is required -- addressLine1, addressLine2, city, state, zip and/or country

state.description: At least one address field is required -- addressLine1, addressLine2, city, state, zip and/or country

zip.description: At least one address field is required -- addressLine1, addressLine2, city, state, zip and/or country

country.description: At least one address field is required -- addressLine1, addressLine2, city, state, zip and/or country

timeZoneSetup.description: The specified system time zone for the Company

taxCode.description: New companies will be created with the default tax code unless otherwise specified.

deviceType.description: deviceType is required if the managementSolution is Legacy

company.description: The company or vendor selected by member from the company/vendor picker component

vendorPickerFlag.description: If true, this record was created by the vendor picker component. Otherwise, the record was created by the company picker component.

CountryReference.description: At least one address field is required -- addressLine1, addressLine2, city, state, zip and/or country

globalLoginUsername.description: This is only required when globalLoginFlag = true

globalLoginPassword.description: This is only required when globalLoginFlag = true

executiveSummaryReportScheduleDay.description: This is only required when scheduleExecutiveSummaryReportFlag = true

executiveSummaryReportScheduleHour.description: This is only required when scheduleExecutiveSummaryReportFlag = true. Input should be in 24 hour format, ie 2pm is 14

executiveSummaryReportScheduleMinute.description: This is only required when scheduleExecutiveSummaryReportFlag = true

managementSolutionName.description: This is only required when managementItSolutionType is Custom

managementServerUrl.description: This is only required for Level Platforms and Kaseya

webserviceOverrideUrl.description: This is only required for Level Platforms and Kaseya when overrideWebServiceLocationFlag is true

portalOverrideLoginUrl.description: This is only required for Level Platforms and Kaseya when overrideLoginLocationFlag is true

globalLoginUsername.description: This is only required when globalLoginFlag = true

globalLoginPassword.description: This is only required when globalLoginFlag = true

nAbleUsername.description: This is only required for N-Able solution

nAblePassword.description: This is only required for N-Able solution

continuumApiUsername.description: This is only required for Continuum solution

continuumApiPassword.description: This is only required for Continuum solution

levelApiUsername.description: This is only required for Level Platforms solution

levelApiPassword.description: This is only required for Level Platforms solution

levelVarDomain.description: This is only required for Level Platforms solution

id.description: An existing Portal Configuration id is required when copying a Portal Configuration.

TaxCodeReference.description: New companies will be created with the default tax code unless otherwise specified.

TimeZoneSetupReference.description: The specified system time zone for the Company

BasicAuth.description: Basic authentication. Must be formatted as [companyName]+[publicKey]:[privateKey]
